Update with standards

Source: R/fn_update.R
update_with_standards.Rd

update_with_standards() is an Update function that edits an object, while preserving core object attributes. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to update with standards. Function argument seed_df specifies the object to be updated. Argument standards_df provides the object to be updated. The function returns Standardised dataset (a data.frame).

Usage

update_with_standards(
  seed_df,
  standards_df,
  standards_var_nms_chr,
  correspondences_x_r3 = ready4show::ready4show_correspondences(),
  case_when_false_1L_chr = NA_character_,
  case_when_true_1L_chr = NA_character_,
  case_when_true_ls = NULL,
  case_when_var_1L_chr = NA_character_,
  order_1L_lgl = F,
  reference_var_nm_1L_chr = "country.etc",
  filter_cdn_1L_chr = NA_character_,
  force_standard_1L_lgl = F,
  fuzzy_logic_1L_chr = character(0),
  max_distance_1L_dbl = Inf,
  tf_false_val_1L_lgl = T
)

Arguments

seed_df

Seed (a data.frame)

standards_df

Standards (a data.frame)

standards_var_nms_chr

Standards variable names (a character vector)

correspondences_x_r3

Correspondences x (a ready4 S3), Default: ready4show::ready4show_correspondences()

case_when_false_1L_chr

Case when false (a character vector of length one), Default: 'NA'

case_when_true_1L_chr

Case when true (a character vector of length one), Default: 'NA'

case_when_true_ls

Case when true (a list), Default: NULL

case_when_var_1L_chr

Case when variable (a character vector of length one), Default: 'NA'

order_1L_lgl

Order (a logical vector of length one), Default: F

reference_var_nm_1L_chr

Reference variable name (a character vector of length one), Default: 'country.etc'

filter_cdn_1L_chr

Filter condition (a character vector of length one), Default: 'NA'

force_standard_1L_lgl

Force standard (a logical vector of length one), Default: F

fuzzy_logic_1L_chr

Fuzzy logic (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

max_distance_1L_dbl

Maximum distance (a double vector of length one), Default: Inf

tf_false_val_1L_lgl

Transform false value (a logical vector of length one), Default: T

Value

Standardised dataset (a data.frame)
